SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.mime.headers

Class HeaderWrangler

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.mime.headers.HeaderWrangler
public class HeaderWrangler extends Object
MIME email header content injector.

Processes email bytes to inject tags into header values, append new headers, and remove specified headers. Tags can be prepended to any header value (e.g., [SPAM] for Subject header). New headers can be added after the existing headers, right before the content. Headers can be removed by specifying their names (case-insensitive).

If a header value is encoded (RFC 2047), the tag is encoded the same way and the value is properly folded onto the next line with appropriate whitespace.

    • removeHeaders

      public HeaderWrangler removeHeaders(List<String> headerNames)
      Configures headers to be removed during processing. Header names are matched case-insensitively, and both the header and its continuation lines are removed.
      Parameters:
      headerNames - List of header names to remove (case-insensitive).
      Returns:
      Self for chaining.

    • process

      public HeaderWrangler process(InputStream input, OutputStream output) throws IOException
      Processes the email from input stream and writes the modified email to output stream. Applies header tags and new headers as configured.
      Parameters:
      input - Input stream containing the original email.
      output - Output stream to write the modified email.
      Returns:
      Self for chaining.
      Throws:
      IOException - If processing fails.

    • getTaggedValue

      private String getTaggedValue(String headerName, String headerValue)
      Gets the tagged value for a header if a tag is configured.
      Parameters:
      headerName - Header name.
      headerValue - Original header value.
      Returns:
      Tagged header value or original if no tag configured.

    • applyTag

      private String applyTag(String headerValue, String tag)
      Applies a tag to a header value, handling encoding if necessary.
      Parameters:
      headerValue - Original header value.
      tag - Tag to prepend.
      Returns:
      Tagged header value.

    • foldHeaderValue

      private String foldHeaderValue(String headerValue)
      Folds a header value to fit within recommended line length. RFC 5322 recommends lines should be no more than 78 characters.
      Parameters:
      headerValue - Header value to fold.
      Returns:
      Folded header value.

    • shouldRemoveHeader

      private boolean shouldRemoveHeader(String headerName)
      Checks if a header should be removed based on the removal list.
      Parameters:
      headerName - Header name to check.
      Returns:
      True if the header should be removed, false otherwise.
